19 typedef actionlib::SimpleActionClient<move_base_msgs::MoveBaseAction> MoveBaseClient;

21 class MoveRobotFollower
22 {
23 private:
24  ros::Subscriber sub_cam;
25  ros::Subscriber sub_odom;
26  std::vector<std::vector <double>> std_goals;
27  move_base_msgs::MoveBaseGoal current_goal;
28  double pose_x, pose_y, pose_yaw; // x in [m], y in [m], yaw in rad
29 public:
30  bool standardActive;
31  int check_change;
32  int goal_index;

42 MoveRobotFollower::MoveRobotFollower(): ac("move_base", true)
43 {
44  ros::NodeHandle nh("~");
45  sub_cam = nh.subscribe("sub_cam_x_pos", 10, &MoveRobotFollower::callbackCamera, this);
46  sub_odom = nh.subscribe("sub_odom_follower", 10, &MoveRobotFollower::callbackOdom, this);
47 
48  current_goal.target_pose.header.frame_id = "map";
49  goal_index = 0;
50  check_change = 100;
51  standardActive = true;
52 
53  // read the goals defined in the yaml file (maps folder)
54  std_goals.resize(10);
55 
56  ros::param::get("/robot2/move_robot_follower/goal1", std_goals[0]);
57  ros::param::get("/robot2/move_robot_follower/goal2", std_goals[1]);
58  ros::param::get("/robot2/move_robot_follower/goal3", std_goals[2]);
59  ros::param::get("/robot2/move_robot_follower/goal4", std_goals[3]);
60  ros::param::get("/robot2/move_robot_follower/goal5", std_goals[4]);
61  ros::param::get("/robot2/move_robot_follower/goal6", std_goals[5]);
62  ros::param::get("/robot2/move_robot_follower/goal7", std_goals[6]);
63  ros::param::get("/robot2/move_robot_follower/goal8", std_goals[7]);
64  ros::param::get("/robot2/move_robot_follower/goal9", std_goals[8]);
65  ros::param::get("/robot2/move_robot_follower/goal10", std_goals[9]);
66 
67  //std::cout << "\n\n\ngoals: x:" << goals[0][0] << " y:" << goals[0][1] << std::endl;
68  //std::cout << "goals: x:" << goals[1][0] << " y:" << goals[1][1] << std::endl;
69  //std::cout << "goals: x:" << goals[2][0] << " y:" << goals[2][1] << "\n" << std::endl;
70 
71  //wait for the action server to come up
72  while(!ac.waitForServer(ros::Duration(5.0)))
73  {
74  ROS_INFO("Waiting for the move_base action server to come up");
75  }
76 }

87 void MoveRobotFollower::callbackOdom(const nav_msgs::Odometry::ConstPtr& odom_data)
88 {
89  //std::cout << "================ODOM=================" << std::endl;
90  tf::Quaternion quat;
91  tf::quaternionMsgToTF(odom_data->pose.pose.orientation, quat);
92 
93  pose_x = odom_data->pose.pose.position.x;
94  pose_y = odom_data->pose.pose.position.y;
95  pose_yaw = tf::getYaw(quat);
96 }
97 
103 void MoveRobotFollower::callbackCamera(const std_msgs::String::ConstPtr& msg)
104 {
105  std::cout << "\n================CAMERA============================" << std::endl;
106  std::cout << "\nReceived message: " << msg->data.c_str() << std::endl;
107 
108  int section = std::stoi(msg->data.c_str());
109  std::cout << "section: " << section << "\tcheck_cahnge: " << check_change << std::endl;
110 
111  if(section != check_change)
112  {
113  // TImer wÃ¤r noch nice, sofern einmal dedektiert, dass das Ziel nicht Ã¼berschrieben wird zu standardPath wir auch wenn er den ROboter verloren hat
114  if(section != 0) followRobot(section);
115  else if(section == 0) standardPath();
116  check_change = section;
117  }
118 }
119 
125 void MoveRobotFollower::followRobot(int section)
126 {
127  ROS_INFO("\n--------------FOLLOW PATH ----------------\n");
128  standardActive = false;
129 
130  double x_new, y_new, yaw_new;
131  double angle_offset;
132 
133  switch (section)
134  {
135  case 1:
136  angle_offset = PI/5;
137  break;
138  case 2:
139  angle_offset = PI/7;
140  break;
141  case 3:
142  angle_offset = 0;
143  break;
144  case 4:
145  angle_offset = -PI/7;
146  break;
147  case 5:
148  angle_offset = -PI/5;
149  break;
150  default:
151  break;
152  }
153 
154  x_new = pose_x + FORWARD_DISTANCE * cos(pose_yaw + angle_offset);
155  y_new = pose_y + FORWARD_DISTANCE * sin(pose_yaw + angle_offset);
156  yaw_new = pose_yaw + angle_offset;
157 
158  std::cout << "x: " << pose_x << "\ty: " << pose_y << "\tyaw: " << pose_yaw << std::endl;
159  std::cout << "x_new: " << x_new << "\ty_new: " << y_new << "\tyaw_new: " << yaw_new << std::endl;
160 
161  current_goal.target_pose.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
162  current_goal.target_pose.pose.position.x = x_new;
163  current_goal.target_pose.pose.position.y = y_new;
164  current_goal.target_pose.pose.orientation = tf::createQuaternionMsgFromYaw(yaw_new);
165 
166  ac.sendGoal(current_goal);
167 }
168 
174 void MoveRobotFollower::standardPath()
175 {
176  ROS_INFO("\n____________Standard PATH ______________\n");
177  standardActive = true;
178  double yaw = std_goals[goal_index][2]; // the orientation around the z-axis in radians
179  geometry_msgs::Quaternion quat = tf::createQuaternionMsgFromYaw(yaw);
180 
181  current_goal.target_pose.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
182  current_goal.target_pose.pose.position.x = std_goals[goal_index][0];
183  current_goal.target_pose.pose.position.y = std_goals[goal_index][1];
184  current_goal.target_pose.pose.orientation = quat;
185 
186  ac.sendGoal(current_goal);
187 }
188 
189 
194 int main(int argc, char** argv)
195 {
196  ros::init(argc, argv, "simple_navigation_goals");
197  MoveRobotFollower mba;
198 
199  ros::Rate rate(5); // set the rate to 10 hz
200  while(ros::ok())
201  {
202  std::cout << "\n\nMAIN\n" << std::endl;
203  //if abfrage nur wÃ¤hrend standard path activ ist
204  if(mba.standardActive && mba.ac.getState() == actionlib::SimpleClientGoalState::SUCCEEDED)
205  {
206  ROS_INFO("Robot reached goal\n\n\n\n");
207 
208  if(mba.goal_index > 9)
209  {
210  mba.goal_index = 0;
211  } else {
212  mba.goal_index++;
213  mba.check_change = 100;
214  }
215  }
216  ros::spinOnce();
217  rate.sleep();
218  }
219  return 0;
220 }
